name: Doctor_Hale's God Game
description: The game concept is to make a simple single level and boss (at the very least) for my game, made to be like games such as Metroid, Shovel Knight and Castle Crashers mechanics and game layout wise. The game will take heavy inspiration from given pantheon theme (Inuit), although with some edits/ exaggeration to creatures and ideas from folklore. It will have RPG elements, as well as Metroidvania elements with plenty of different progression options for longevity.
